jedi:cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
jedi:cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.
jedi:cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

jedi:forcepull.NAME: Force Pull
jedi:forcepull.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw a card.

jedi:forcepush.NAME: Force Push
jedi:forcepush.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw a card.

jedi:BurstLightning.NAME: Burst Lightning
jedi:BurstLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scales with Focus instead of Strength. NL Is affected by Electrodynamics.
jedi:BurstLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scales !M! times with Focus instead of Strength. NL Is affected by Electrodynamics.

jedi:BurstFrost.NAME: Burst Frost
jedi:BurstFrost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scales with Focus instead of Dexterity.
jedi:BurstFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scales !M! times with Focus instead of Dexterity.

jedi:BurstDark.NAME: Burst Dark
jedi:BurstDark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Focus affects this card !M! times. NL Is not affected by Strength.

jedi:hex.NAME: Hex
jedi:hex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

jedi:sharpshooter.NAME: Sharpshooter
jedi:sharpshooter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy has Lock-On, gain [E] and draw a card.

jedi:readyaimfire.NAME: Ready, Aim, Fire
jedi:readyaimfire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Evoke ALL orbs. NL Exhaust.

jedi:reiji.NAME: Reiji
jedi:reiji.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply 3 Lock-On. NL Exhaust.
jedi:reiji.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply 3 Lock-On. NL Channel !M! Lightning. NL Exhaust.

jedi:blockon.NAME: Block-On
jedi:blockon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Lock-On to all enemies that intend to attack you.

jedi:gatheringstorm.NAME: Gathering Storm
jedi:gatheringstorm.DESCRIPTION: For each non-Lightning orb Channeled this combat, Channel 1 Lightning. NL Exhaust.

jedi:meditation.NAME: Meditation
jedi:meditation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus every turn. NL Lose ALL Focus whenever you lose HP.

jedi:darknesscall.NAME: Darkness Call
jedi:darknesscall.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have Dark Orb Channeled. NL Apply 1 Lock-On to an enemy with lowest HP. NL Evoke your rightmost Dark Orb. NL Exhaust.

jedi:frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
jedi:frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, lose 3 Strength this turn.

jedi:strikingstrike.NAME: Striking Strike
jedi:strikingstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random Strike card on the same enemy. NL Exhaust.
jedi:strikingstrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random upgraded Strike card on the same enemy. NL Exhaust.
